messages.speech: There is certain GREAT! training that is mandatory for all employees, and certain training that is mandatory for some employees depending on the role they have. You can find a full list of all training that is mandatory – including refresh frequency requirements if applicable – in the ‘Mandatory Training Planner’, which is available in the ‘Manager’s Resources’ section of the homepage. You should plan any non-mandatory training using the other sections of GREAT! based on job role, as with the previous solution.
